#summary Containers using Caja

= Containers using Caja =
  * [http://developer.yahoo.com/yap/ Yahoo Application Platform]
    All YAP gadgets are cajoled
  * [http://m.www.yahoo.com/ New Yahoo home page]
    All home page gadgets are cajoled in expanded view
  * [http://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/WikiSyntax#Gadgets Gadgets in Google Code Wiki]
    Wiki authors can force untrusted gadgets they embed in their page to be cajoled with the `caja=1` attribute setting
  * [http://www.google.com/ig iGoogle] and [http://www.orkut.com Orkut]
    Gadget authors can protect themselves from accidental XSS errors by requiring the caja feature with `<Require feature="caja" />`
 * [http://incubator.apache.org/shindig/ Shindig] reference implementation of OpenSocial
